404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been deleted, moved to a different location, or you may not have permission to access it.

403.title: Access Forbidden
403.message: Sorry, you don't have permission to access this page or resource. Please log in or check your permissions to continue.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: Sorry, there was an error with the data sent or the request format is incorrect. Please check your input and try again.

tips.title: Tips to resolve this:
tips.checkUrl: Check if the URL is correct
tips.checkData: Verify your input data and ensure it's complete
tips.tryAgain: Try again in a few minutes

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Sorry, an internal server error occurred and we cannot process your request at this time. Our technical team is working to resolve this issue. Please try again in a few minutes.
